short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your web browsing experience with Stickies Everywhere, the ultimate Chrome extension for adding notes to any website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're conducting research, managing tasks, or simply jotting down ideas, Sticky Everywhere lets you seamlessly integrate notes into your browsing routine. With just a few clicks you can keep track of your thoughts across the internet.

Key Features:
Unlimited Notes: Create as many sticky notes as you need, without any limitations.
Customization: Personalize your notes with different colors to suit your preferences.
Privacy Protection: Your notes are securely stored locally on your device, ensuring your privacy and confidentiality.

Whether you're a student, professional, or casual internet user, Sticky Everywhere empowers you to stay organized and productive while browsing the web. Download now and start adding sticky notes to your favorite websites today!
